Determining Entitlement for Multiple Children in DIC Cases When the Surviving Spouse Loses Entitlement
In DIC cases, when the child’s entitlement arises because the surviving spouse’s entitlement has been terminated, withhold benefits under
38 CFR 3.107
for any additional child that may be payable when a claim is filed within one year of the date that the child’s entitlement arose.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section E - Remarriage of a Surviving Spouse
